mapper.sql: create_user, create_time, modify_user, modify_time, is_deleted, id, career_talk_id, student_id, status
mapper.select: SELECT t1.* FROM ( SELECT cjfc.job_fair_id, cjfc.company_id, cjfc.campus_id, cj.year_level_id year_id, ct.type_name year_name, cj.quarter, cj.job_fair_title, ct2.type_name campus_name, cc.career_talk_title, cts.id, cts.student_id, cs.student_name, cs.student_sex, ct3.type_name student_year_level, cg.profession_id, cp.profession_name FROM crim_job_fair_company cjfc INNER JOIN crim_job_fair cj ON cjfc.job_fair_id = cj.id AND cj.is_deleted = 0 INNER JOIN crim_type ct ON cj.year_level_id = ct.id AND ct.is_deleted = 0 INNER JOIN crim_type ct2 ON cjfc.campus_id = ct2.id AND ct2.is_deleted = 0 INNER JOIN crim_career_talk cc ON cjfc.id = cc.job_fair_company_id AND cc.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN crim_career_talk_student cts ON cc.id = cts.career_talk_id AND cts.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN crim_student cs ON cts.student_id = cs.id AND cs.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN crim_grade_class cg ON cs.grade_class_id = cg.id AND cg.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN crim_type ct3 ON cg.year_level_id = ct3.id AND ct3.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN crim_profession cp ON cg.profession_id = cp.id AND cp.is_deleted = 0 WHERE cjfc.is_deleted = 0 ) t1 ${ew.customSqlSegment}
